synopsis.text: For Yuuichi Aizawa, moving back to his aunt's northern town after seven years brings a mix of unfamiliarity and nostalgia. Due to his parents' career pursuits in Africa, Yuuichi finds himself in a town where his memories have mysteriously faded, leaving even his cousin Nayuki feeling like a stranger. As he settles into his new home, an old red headband sparks a journey of rediscovery, leading him through snow-covered streets and into the lives of several young women who share a connection with his forgotten past. As fragments of his memories resurface, Yuuichi uncovers buried secrets, broken promises, and a hint of the supernatural that weaves a complex web around his past and present. Prepare for a heartwarming tale filled with emotions, mystery, and the supernatural as Yuuichi reconnects with the people who once held a special place in his life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
